nodes.text: The Hidden is an 7-page comic featured in Star Wars Tales 6. It was written by Sean Konot and Scott Morse, illustrated by Scot Morse and lettered by Sean Konot.

Above the planet Dagobah an Imperial Star Destroyer launched multiple probe droid pods. One of the droids was almost immediately attacked by a native creature but the droid easily killed it. At one moment the droid detected a little green creature and the droid followed it. Unfortunately, for the droid, this little green creature was Yoda. Yoda used his lightsaber to disable the droid with ease.

The Imperials in their Star Destroyer were shocked by the sudden attack. The only problem was that they could not receive any transmissions from the planet, so they were unable to see who or what destroyed their scout. The onboard admiral quickly decided to skip this inhospitable planet on their scouting trip because he did not want to enrage Lord Vader.
Afterward, Yoda had a new tool for cooking.
